about_the_game:
About This Content


Take charge of the hardest-working locomotives in Britain today; experience unique Unit Drag services, hauling EMUs to and from refurbishment, thrashing throughout the Medway Towns and beyond with Train Sim World 3: Rail Operations Group BR Class 37/7!

Known to many as the Tractor, the BR Class 37 is a living legend and mainline stalwart that dates back to the earliest days of mass dieselisation. Built by their hundreds, there won’t have been many enthusiasts, staff members or commuters who have not seen a 37 in their lifetime. From coast to coast, decade by decade, the 37 still reigns.

But how are 60-year-old locomotives still working the mainline? Enter, Rail Operations Group! There are many aspects to the rail industry, one of which is the movement of stock which cannot necessarily be moved under its own power, this is where “ROG” operate, and the Class 37’s unmatched reliability and versatility makes it a perfect candidate for such tasks.

Hooked up with bespoke equipment, and an adaptive Dellner coupler (eliminating the need for translator wagons), the ROG Class 37 played a fundamental role in the movement of Class 375 Electrostars during the SERefurb program. Now, in Train Sim World 3, re-kindle the days of weekly thrash through the Medway Towns, dragging out of service Class 375s sporting their older White livery.

Key Features


  • BR Class 37/7 diesel locomotive in Europhoenix livery with Rail Operations Group branding, equipped with Dellner coupler and bespoke in-cab equipment
  • BR Class 375/9 in Southeastern White & Grey livery
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
  • Includes 3 scenarios and additional Timetable services for Southeastern Highspeed
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download Size: 251.8 MB
